Load Data
```{r, echo=FALSE}
data <- load_data('GSE64403_FPKM_table.txt')
head(data)
```
Sample Info Exploration
```{r}
cs <- column_summary(data)
print(cs)
p <- plot_continous_var(data, "vP")
print(p)
```

Counts Matrix Exploration
```{r}
data <- counts_matrix_exploration(data, .75, 3)
updated_data <- data[[1]]
filtered_data <- data[[2]] 
print(data)
```
